description:
http://anidb.net/ch65416 [Keiichirou]`s sworn brother who adores him unconditionally and is always accompanying him. He`s not a fighter at all, but is fanatical about foreign countries and machinery and has invented many new machines. Physically weak, but tries desperately to support Keiichirou. He is proud of his slicked topknot hairstyle.
Source: ANN
name: Hyakusuke
